description: Ready in 25 minutes, these chocolate-crackle mud cake truffles make a perfect festive treat to impress guests.
name: Chocolatecrackle Mud Cake Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using damp hands, roll mixture into 12 balls, then mould rice bubble mixture around each ball. Place on prepared tray. Allow to set. Serve.
